question: 王子
sourceMnemonic: A king kid is the <vocabulary>prince</vocabulary>. Someday he'll be the <ja>王</ja>, if he's lucky, but right now he's just the king's child.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Also take note that the reading for <ja>子</ja> (<ja>し</ja>) is changed to <ja>じ</ja>.
